anti_text_wall.enforcement: MAXIMUM 2 consecutive paragraphs OR 6-8 lines of text before visual element. Even short paragraphs create text walls when stacked.

language_accessibility.target_audience: CTOs, business owners, non-technical decision makers
language_accessibility.jargon_policy: ALWAYS define technical terms immediately when first used
language_accessibility.explanation_requirement: Every technical concept must be explained in plain English

examples.correct: CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment) - automated systems that test and deploy code changes instantly
examples.incorrect: Implement CI/CD pipelines with blue-green deployments

language_accessibility.tone: Professional but accessible - explain benefits in business terms, not technical specifications

syntax_warnings.quotes: Use regular single quotes (') NOT escaped quotes (\') in imports
syntax_warnings.color_palette: ONLY use text-primary class (#01FB87), NO custom colors

writing_guidelines.technical_terms: MANDATORY: Define all technical terms when first mentioned
writing_guidelines.acronym_policy: Spell out acronyms with explanation: 'API (Application Programming Interface) - the way different software systems talk to each other'
writing_guidelines.concept_explanations: Use analogies and real-world comparisons for complex concepts
writing_guidelines.benefit_focus: Lead with business benefits, then explain how the technology achieves them
